before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"15jms","text":"Buffer ATL and Buffer AL may form precipitates upon storage. If necessary, warm to 56°C until the precipitates have fully dissolved.  Buffer AW1 and Buffer AW2 are supplied as concentrates. Before using for the first time, add the appropriate amount of ethanol (96–100%) as indicated on the bottle to obtain a working solution.  Preheat a thermomixer, shaking water bath or rocking platform to 56°C for use in step 2.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cu4re","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"6bq7h","text":"Oxford Nanopore Technologies (ONT) offers a streamlined workflow for the identification of somatic variants in tumor samples. This workflow generates long-read and high-quality sequencing data that can be used for analysis with the EPI2ME wf-somatic-variation workflow. This workflow can be run through a user interface or the command line and minimizes hands-on analysis. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
disclaimer: {"blocks":[{"key":"4m9a4","text":"This was created as part of a class assignment. It is based on published and well-documented protocols (referenced)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"61qvq","text":"All Centrifuge steps are done at room temperature (15-25°C)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"crrag","text":"Vortexing should be done by pulse-vortexing for 5 - 10 Seconds","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3gffg","text":"Check kit specifications for other potentially hazardous material ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"26tsv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6mcp3","text":"Optional: Samples can be treated with RNAse A to digest RNA during the procedure (not supplied in listed DNA extraction kit)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"28co1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fh0cg","text":"To multiplex libraries, combine with the ONT Native Barcoding Kit","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7dfv7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"beakc","text":"The recommended workflow for identifying somatic variants in tumor-normal sequencing data is the wf-somatic-variation through EPI2ME. This can be run through the GUI (recommended) or command line. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e6u4f","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5uv49","text":"For other modified options including indels and methylation analysis refer to : https://github.com/epi2me-labs/wf-somatic-variation","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":80,"length":51}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":80,"length":51}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"B1932F86FDA311EEA7960A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://github.com/epi2me-labs/wf-somatic-variation"}}}}

(SQK-LSK114)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bcdce","text":"Consumables Required: status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.section: DNA Extraction (QIAGEN DNEasy Blood and Tissue Kit or alternative extraction method)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"bnihs","text":"Add 180 ul Buffer ATL into a labeled 1.5 mL tube for each tissue specimen. Cut 25 mg of tissue into small pieces and place in the labeled tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: DNA Extraction (QIAGEN DNEasy Blood and Tissue Kit or alternative extraction method)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"53ki0","text":"Spin down the samples and add 20 ul Proteinase K. Mix by vortexing and incubate at 56°C until tissue is completely lysed. Vortex occasionally to check status. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: DNA Extraction (QIAGEN DNEasy Blood and Tissue Kit or alternative extraction method)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"3pfjb","text":"(Optional): Add 4 ul RNase A (100 mg/ml), mix by vortexing, and incubate for 2 min at room temperature. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: DNA Extraction (QIAGEN DNEasy Blood and Tissue Kit or alternative extraction method)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"abuem","text":"Vortex for 15 seconds. Add 200 ul Buffer AL to the sample and mix thoroughly by vortexing. Add 200 ul ethanol (96%-100%), and mix again by vortexing. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: DNA Extraction (QIAGEN DNEasy Blood and Tissue Kit or alternative extraction method)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"52pv5","text":"It is essential that the sample, Buffer AL, and ethanol are mixed immediately and thoroughly by vortexing or pipetting to yield a homogeneous solution. Buffer AL and ethanol can be premixed and added together in one step to save time when processing multiple samples. A white precipitate may form on addition of Buffer AL and ethanol. This precipitate does not interfere with the DNeasy procedure. Some tissue types (e.g., spleen, lung) may form a gelatinous lysate after addition of Buffer AL and ethanol. In this case, vigorously shaking or vortexing the preparation is recommended. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: DNA Extraction (QIAGEN DNEasy Blood and Tissue Kit or alternative extraction method)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"baldv","text":"Pipet the mixture into the provided DNeasy Mini spin column in a 2 ml collection tube. Centrifuge at top speed for 1 minute. Discard the flow-through and collection tube. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: DNA Extraction (QIAGEN DNEasy Blood and Tissue Kit or alternative extraction method)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"23bbj","text":"Place the spin column in a new 2 ml collection tube, add 500 ul Buffer AW1 and centrifuge for 1 min at top speed. Discard flow-through and collection tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: DNA Extraction (QIAGEN DNEasy Blood and Tissue Kit or alternative extraction method)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6e87m","text":"Place the spin column in a new 2 ml collection tube, add 500 ul Buffer AW2, and centrifuge for 1 minute at top speed. Discard flow-through but retain collection tube. ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"83rn6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: DNA Extraction (QIAGEN DNEasy Blood and Tissue Kit or alternative extraction method)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"fk42a","text":"Add 500 ul of 70% (cold) ethanol. Centrifuge for 3 minutes at top speed to dry the DNeasy membrane. Discard flow through and collection tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: DNA Extraction (QIAGEN DNEasy Blood and Tissue Kit or alternative extraction method)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"722cg","text":"Remove the spin column carefully so it does not come into contact with the flow-through.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c0q2","text":"This will result in the carry-over of ethanol. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2et6o","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: DNA Extraction (QIAGEN DNEasy Blood and Tissue Kit or alternative extraction method)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"1obgu","text":"Place the spin column in a new 2ml collection tube and add 200 ul Buffer AE directly onto the membrane. Let sit at room temperature for 1 minute and then centrifuge for 1 min at max speed to elute. Repeat the elution step to increase DNA yield.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: DNA Extraction (QIAGEN DNEasy Blood and Tissue Kit or alternative extraction method)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"70to3","text":"Proceed to quantify the DNA. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Library Preparation (ONT Ligation Sequencing Kit): Note third-party consumables are required
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"cjecq","text":"Thaw the DNA Control Sample (DCS) at room temperature, spin down, mix by pipetting, and store on ice until ready to use","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fmjf2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Library Preparation (ONT Ligation Sequencing Kit): Note third-party consumables are required
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"esbth","text":"Recommended but 1 ul sample DNA or nuclease-free water can be used in place","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Library Preparation (ONT Ligation Sequencing Kit): Note third-party consumables are required
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"2not8","text":"Prepare the NEBNext FFPE DNA Repair Mix, and NEBNext Ultra II End Repair/ dA-tailing Module reagents according to manufacturer’s recommendations. Store on Ice","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Library Preparation (ONT Ligation Sequencing Kit): Note third-party consumables are required
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"65i3i","text":"a. Recommended to flix or invert the reagent tubes to mix","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cqlvr","text":"b. Do not vortex the FFPE DNA Repair Mix or Ultra II end Prep Enzyme Mix","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Library Preparation (ONT Ligation Sequencing Kit): Note third-party consumables are required
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"2otfv","text":"Prepare the DNA in nuclease-free water:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fh2qq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Library Preparation (ONT Ligation Sequencing Kit): Note third-party consumables are required
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"be3ci","text":"1) Transfer 1 ug DNA into a 1.5 ml Eppendorf DNA LoBind tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Library Preparation (ONT Ligation Sequencing Kit): Note third-party consumables are required
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"a38gu","text":"2) Adjust the volume to 47 ul with nuclease-free water","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Library Preparation (ONT Ligation Sequencing Kit): Note third-party consumables are required
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"fsneh","text":"3) Mix by pipetting up and down gently or by flicking the tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Library Preparation (ONT Ligation Sequencing Kit): Note third-party consumables are required
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"qcha","text":"4) Spin down briefly in a microfuge","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Library Preparation (ONT Ligation Sequencing Kit): Note third-party consumables are required
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"3d5ms","text":"In a 0.2 ml thin-walled PCR tube, mix the following: (A = Reagent)(B = Volume ul)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e10qj","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"50mb3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","3_0":"","3_1":"","4_0":"","4_1":"","5_0":"","5_1":"","6_0":"","6_1":""},"colTitles":[],"colWidths":[],"data":[["DNA from Step 3","47"],["DNA CS (optional) or nuclease-free water","1"],["NEBNext FFPE DNA Repair Buffer","3.5"],["NEBNext FFPE DNA Repair Mix","2"],["Ultra II End-prep Reaction Buffer","3.5"],["Ultra II End-prep Enzyme Mix ","3"],["Total","60 ul "]],"guid":"AEEB08ED14054AC7B418A732C43C01AD","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":[],"printData":[["DNA from Step 3","47"],["DNA CS (optional) or nuclease-free water","1"],["NEBNext FFPE DNA Repair Buffer","3.5"],["NEBNext FFPE DNA Repair Mix","2"],["Ultra II End-prep Reaction Buffer","3.5"],["Ultra II End-prep Enzyme Mix ","3"],["Total","60 ul "]],"rowHeights":[]}}}}

steps.section: Library Preparation (ONT Ligation Sequencing Kit): Note third-party consumables are required
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"ecrao","text":" Between additions of each reagent, pipette to mix 10-20 times (gently) ReagentVolume (ul)DNA from Step 347DNA CS (optional) or nuclease-free water1NEBNext FFPE DNA Repair Buffer3.5NEBNext FFPE DNA Repair Mix2Ultra II End-prep Reaction Buffer3.5Ultra II End-prep Enzyme Mix 3Total60 ul ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Library Preparation (ONT Ligation Sequencing Kit): Note third-party consumables are required
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"b3ukd","text":"Mix thoroughly by gently pipetting and spinning down ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Library Preparation (ONT Ligation Sequencing Kit): Note third-party consumables are required
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"82mrq","text":"Using a thermal cycler incubate with the following conditions","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Library Preparation (ONT Ligation Sequencing Kit): Note third-party consumables are required
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"3nh8o","text":"20°C for 5 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Library Preparation (ONT Ligation Sequencing Kit): Note third-party consumables are required
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"eo6p8","text":"65°C for 5 minutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Library Preparation (ONT Ligation Sequencing Kit): Note third-party consumables are required
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6kh0r","text":"Resuspend Ampure XP beads by vortexing","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Library Preparation (ONT Ligation Sequencing Kit): Note third-party consumables are required
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"dlusc","text":"Transfer the DNA sample to a new clean 1.5 ml Eppendorf DNA LoBind tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Library Preparation (ONT Ligation Sequencing Kit): Note third-party consumables are required
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"dci36","text":"Add 60 ul of resuspended AmPure Beads to the end-prep reaction. Mix by flicking or inverting the tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Library Preparation (ONT Ligation Sequencing Kit): Note third-party consumables are required
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"esesg","text":"Incubate on hula or other rotator for 5 minutes at room temperature","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Library Preparation (ONT Ligation Sequencing Kit): Note third-party consumables are required
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"536ep","text":"Prepare 500 ul of fresh 80% ethanol in nuclease-free water","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Library Preparation (ONT Ligation Sequencing Kit): Note third-party consumables are required
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"9bjvj","text":"Spin down the sample and pellet on a magnet until the supernatant is clear and colorless. Keep the tube on the magnet, and pipette off the supernatant","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Library Preparation (ONT Ligation Sequencing Kit): Note third-party consumables are required
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"34d1u","text":"Keep the tube on the magnet and wash the beads with 200 ul of freshly prepared 80% ethanol without disturbing the pellet. Let sit for 30 seconds. Remove the ethanol using a pipette and discard. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Library Preparation (ONT Ligation Sequencing Kit): Note third-party consumables are required
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"7fmdj","text":"Repeat the wash","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Library Preparation (ONT Ligation Sequencing Kit): Note third-party consumables are required
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"drove","text":"Spin down and place the tube back on the magnet. Pipette off any residual ethanol. Allow to dry for ~30 seconds. Do not dry the pellet to the point of cracking","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Library Preparation (ONT Ligation Sequencing Kit): Note third-party consumables are required
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4623j","text":"Remove the tube from the magnetic rack and resuspend the pellet in 61 ul nuclease-free water. Incubate for 2 minutes at room temperature ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Library Preparation (ONT Ligation Sequencing Kit): Note third-party consumables are required
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"7mmkt","text":"Pellet the beads on a magnet until the eluate is clear and colorless (~ 1 min or more)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Library Preparation (ONT Ligation Sequencing Kit): Note third-party consumables are required
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"9ln2k","text":"Remove and retain 61 ul of eluate into a clean 1.5 ml Eppendorf DNA LoBind tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Library Preparation (ONT Ligation Sequencing Kit): Note third-party consumables are required
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"c8acd","text":"Use 1 ul of eluted sample using a fluoremeter","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Library Preparation (ONT Ligation Sequencing Kit): Note third-party consumables are required
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"14aqb","text":"Spin down the Ligation Adapter (LA) and Quick T4 Ligase. Store on ice","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Library Preparation (ONT Ligation Sequencing Kit): Note third-party consumables are required
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"b47b4","text":"Thaw Ligation Buffer (LNB) at room temperature, spin down and mix by pipetting. Store on ice immediately after thawing and mixing","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Library Preparation (ONT Ligation Sequencing Kit): Note third-party consumables are required
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"278c","text":"Due to viscosity, vortexing this buffer is ineffective","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Library Preparation (ONT Ligation Sequencing Kit): Note third-party consumables are required
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"16vjg","text":"Thaw the Elution Buffer (EB) at room temperature. Mix by vortexing. Spin down and store on ice","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Library Preparation (ONT Ligation Sequencing Kit): Note third-party consumables are required
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"9p02g","text":"Thaw either the Long Fragment Buffer (LFB) or Short Fragment Buffer (SFB) at room temperature and mix by vortexing. Then spin down and place on ice","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Library Preparation (ONT Ligation Sequencing Kit): Note third-party consumables are required
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"62mr5","text":"In a 1.5 ml Eppendorf DNA LoBind tube, mix in the following order: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Library Preparation (ONT Ligation Sequencing Kit): Note third-party consumables are required
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"1c678","text":"Between addition of each reagent, pipette to mix (gently) 10 - 20 times","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dorem","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"17n85","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4uerm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","3_0":"","3_1":"","4_0":"","4_1":"","5_0":"","5_1":""},"colTitles":[],"colWidths":[],"data":[["Reagent","Volume (ul)"],["DNA Sample from the previous step","60"],["Ligation Buffer (LNB)","25"],["NEBNext Quick T4 DNA Ligase","10"],["Ligation Adapter (LA)","5"],["Total","100 ul "]],"guid":"05533B19C48D440BBE94F16672B15CAF","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"2djgq","text":"Table adapted from the SQK-LSK114 Protocol","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}},"mergeCells":[],"printData":[["Reagent","Volume (ul)"],["DNA Sample from the previous step","60"],["Ligation Buffer (LNB)","25"],["NEBNext Quick T4 DNA Ligase","10"],["Ligation Adapter (LA)","5"],["Total","100 ul "]],"rowHeights":[]}}}}

steps.section: Library Preparation (ONT Ligation Sequencing Kit): Note third-party consumables are required
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6hjbp","text":"Mix thoroughly by gently pipetting and briefly spinning down. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Library Preparation (ONT Ligation Sequencing Kit): Note third-party consumables are required
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5sdst","text":"Incubate the reaction for 10 minutes at room temperature","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Library Preparation (ONT Ligation Sequencing Kit): Note third-party consumables are required
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"dcin8","text":"Resuspend the AMPure XP Beads (AXP) by vortexing ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Library Preparation (ONT Ligation Sequencing Kit): Note third-party consumables are required
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"1r8me","text":"Add 40 ul of resuspended AMPure XP Beads (AXP) to the reaction and mix by flicking the tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Library Preparation (ONT Ligation Sequencing Kit): Note third-party consumables are required
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"9hfvu","text":"Incubate on a Hula mixer for 5 minutes at room temperature ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Library Preparation (ONT Ligation Sequencing Kit): Note third-party consumables are required
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"ms1b","text":"Spin down the sample and pellet on a magnet. Keep the tube on the magnet, and pipette off the supernatant when clear and colorless.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Library Preparation (ONT Ligation Sequencing Kit): Note third-party consumables are required
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"bnpu6","text":"Wash the beads by adding either 250 ul Long Fragment Buffer or 250 ul Short Fragment Buffer. Flick the beads to resuspend, spin down, return the tube to the magnet and allow the beads to pellet. Remove the supernatant and discard","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Library Preparation (ONT Ligation Sequencing Kit): Note third-party consumables are required
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"bgiba","text":"Repeat","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Library Preparation (ONT Ligation Sequencing Kit): Note third-party consumables are required
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"fvvdh","text":"Spin down and place the tube back on the magnet. Pipette off any residual supernatant. Allow to dry for ~30 seconds","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Library Preparation (ONT Ligation Sequencing Kit): Note third-party consumables are required
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"1qqh4","text":"Do not dry the pellet to the point of cracking","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Library Preparation (ONT Ligation Sequencing Kit): Note third-party consumables are required
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"9b1vb","text":"Remove the tube from the magnet and resuspend the pellet in 15 ul Elution Buffer (EB). Spin down and incubate for 10 minutes at room temperature. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Library Preparation (ONT Ligation Sequencing Kit): Note third-party consumables are required
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"v72","text":"For high molecular weight DNA, incubating at 37°C can improve the recovery of long fragments","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Library Preparation (ONT Ligation Sequencing Kit): Note third-party consumables are required
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"amvj9","text":"Pellet the beads on a magnet until the emulate is clear and colorless (~1 min or more)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Library Preparation (ONT Ligation Sequencing Kit): Note third-party consumables are required
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"64km6","text":"Remove and retain 15 ul of eluate containing the DNa library into a clean 1.5 ml Eppendorf DNA LoBind tube. Dispose of the pelleted beads","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Library Preparation (ONT Ligation Sequencing Kit): Note third-party consumables are required
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"bgct8","text":"Proceed to quantify 1 ul of eluted sample using a fluorometer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Library Preparation (ONT Ligation Sequencing Kit): Note third-party consumables are required
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"52fcl","text":"Depending on required output, prepare the final library to 35-50 fmol for high output of simplex data, or 10-20 fmol for duplex data, in 12 ul of Elution Buffer (EB). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Library Preparation (ONT Ligation Sequencing Kit): Note third-party consumables are required
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"2ta8r","text":"If library yields are below input recommendations, load the entire library. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Library Preparation (ONT Ligation Sequencing Kit): Note third-party consumables are required
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"26gfq","text":"Recommended to use duplex data","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Library Preparation (ONT Ligation Sequencing Kit): Note third-party consumables are required
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"7j2vq","text":"Load 10 - 20 fmol of final library. Loading more than 20 fmol of DNA can reduce the rate of duplex read capture","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Library Preparation (ONT Ligation Sequencing Kit): Note third-party consumables are required
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"boiup","text":"Proceed to priming and loading of the flow cell","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
